# bankrupt


Installation
---------------

Use one of the following method:

* pip install
```bash
pip --install bankrupt
pip --install bankrupt --upgrade
```
* clone repository and install with:
```bash
python setup.py install
```        
Usage
-------

```python
>>> import bankrupt
>>> d = [100, 200, 300]
>>> x = bankrupt.allocate(100, d)
```
